name: nodejs-services-under-load-lab
description: Self-study Node.js microservices lab focused on load scenarios and resilience

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n services,workers,dashboard "npm run services" "npm run workers" "npm run dashboard"
scripts.services: concurrently -k -n experience,deal,price,inventory,ratingA,ratingB,ratingLB,merchant "RATING_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3014 ENRICHMENT_CONCURRENCY=220 HYBRID_READ_MODEL_ENABLED=true READ_MODEL_STALE_MS=180000 READ_MODEL_TTL_SECONDS=300 READ_MODEL_LIVE_FALLBACK_MAX=1 READ_MODEL_REFRESH_COOLDOWN_MS=10000 BASE_DEALS_CACHE_TTL_MS=5000 node services/experience-api/server.js" "node services/deal-service/server.js" "node services/price-service/server.js" "node services/inventory-service/server.js" "PORT=3004 INSTANCE_ID=a node services/rating-service/server.js" "PORT=3006 INSTANCE_ID=b node services/rating-service/server.js" "PORT=3014 LB_TARGETS=http://localhost:3004,http://localhost:3006 node services/rating-lb/server.js" "node services/merchant-service/server.js"
scripts.workers: concurrently -k -n enrichment,critical "ENRICHMENT_WORKER_CONCURRENCY=120 READ_MODEL_TTL_SECONDS=300 node workers/enrichment-worker.js" "node workers/critical-worker.js"
